atk-s0508a212:2_0: Vīsatinipāte yaññatthaṁ vātiādikā āyasmato aparassa adhimuttattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a212:2_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a212:2_3: vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute bhikkhusaṅghaṁ upaṭṭhahanto mahādānāni
atk-s0508a212:2_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde āyasmato saṁkiccattherassa bhaginiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0508a212:2_7: So vayappatto mātulattherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṁyeva ṭhito arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a212:12_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento upasampajjitukāmo “mātaraṁ āpucchissāmī”ti mātu santikaṁ
atk-s0508a212:12_1: gacchanto antarāmagge devatāya balikammakaraṇatthaṁ maṁsapariyesanaṁ carantehi pañcasatehi corehi samāgacchi.
atk-s0508a212:12_2: Corā ca taṁ aggahesuṁ “devatāya bali bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0508a212:12_3: So corehi gahitopi abhīto acchambhī vippasannamukhova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a212:14_0: “Yaññatthaṁ vā dhanatthaṁ vā, ye hanāma mayaṁ pure;
atk-s0508a212:15_0: Avasesaṁ bhayaṁ hoti, vedhanti vilapanti ca.
atk-s0508a212:17_0: “Tassa te natthi bhītattaṁ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati;
atk-s0508a212:18_0: Kasmā na paridevesi, evarūpe mahabbhaye”ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a212:19_0: Tattha yaññatthanti yajanatthaṁ devatānaṁ balikammakaraṇatthaṁ vā. Vā-
atk-s0508a212:19_3: Ye hanāma mayaṁ pureti ye satte mayaṁ pubbe hanimha.
atk-s0508a212:19_8: Amhehi gahitesu taṁ ekaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesānaṁ;
atk-s0508a212:20_0: Tassa teti yo tvaṁ amhehi devatāya balikammatthaṁ jīvitā voropetukāmehi ukkhittāsikehi santajjito, tassa te.
atk-s0508a212:20_3: Bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdatīti pakativaṇṇato uparipi te mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdati.
atk-s0508a212:20_7: Evarūpe mahabbhayeti edise mahati maraṇabhaye upaṭṭhite.
atk-s0508a212:21_0: Idāni thero coragāmaṇissa paṭivacanadānamukhena dhammaṁ desento –
atk-s0508a212:27_0: Na bhayaṁ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā.
atk-s0508a212:30_0: Maraṇe me bhayaṁ natthi, rogānamiva saṅkhaye.
atk-s0508a212:33_0: Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhā, visaṁ pitvāva chaḍḍitaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:36_0: Tuṭṭho āyukkhayā hoti, mutto āghātanā yathā.
atk-s0508a212:39_0: Ādittāva gharā mutto, maraṇasmiṁ na socati.
atk-s0508a212:41_0: “Yadatthi saṅgataṁ kiñci, bhavo vā yattha labbhati;
atk-s0508a212:42_0: Sabbaṁ anissaraṁ etaṁ, iti vuttaṁ mahesinā.
atk-s0508a212:44_0: “Yo taṁ tathā pajānāti, yathā buddhena desitaṁ;
atk-s0508a212:45_0: Na gaṇhāti bhavaṁ kiñci, sutattaṁva ayoguḷaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:51_0: Passantassa yathābhūtaṁ, na bhayaṁ hoti gāmaṇi.
atk-s0508a212:54_0: Mamattaṁ so asaṁvindaṁ, ‘natthi me’ti na socati.
atk-s0508a212:57_0: Soyaṁ bhijjissati kāyo, añño ca na bhavissati.
atk-s0508a212:59_0: “Yaṁ vo kiccaṁ sarīrena, taṁ karotha yadicchatha;
atk-s0508a212:60_0: Na me tappaccayā tattha, doso pemañca hehitī”ti. –
atk-s0508a212:65_0: Ayaṁ saṅgītikārehi vuttagāthā. Ito aparā tisso corānaṁ, therassa ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā –
atk-s0508a212:67_0: “Kiṁ bhadante karitvāna, ko vā ācariyo tava;

atk-s0508a212:77_0: Tamhā ca kammā viramiṁsu eke, eke ca pabbajjamarocayiṁsu.
atk-s0508a212:79_0: “Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsane, bhāvetva bojjhaṅgabalāni paṇḍitā;
atk-s0508a212:80_0: Udaggacittā sumanā katindriyā, phusiṁsu nibbānapadaṁ asaṅkhata”nti. –
atk-s0508a212:82_9: Atikkantā bhayā sabbeti khīṇasaṁyojanassa arahato pañcavīsati mahābhayā,
atk-s0508a212:82_10: aññe ca sabbepi bhayā ekaṁsena atikkantā atītā,
atk-s0508a212:83_0: Diṭṭhe dhamme yathātatheti catusaccadhamme pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṁ diṭṭhe.
atk-s0508a212:83_2: Bhāranikkhepane yathāti yathā koci puriso sīse ṭhitena mahatā garubhārena saṁsīdanto tassa nikkhepane,
atk-s0508a212:86_3: Tato eva maggo cāpi subhāvito aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggopi sammadeva bhāvito.
atk-s0508a212:86_4: Rogānamiva saṅkhayeti yathā bahūhi rogehi abhibhūtassa āturassa rogānaṁ saṅkhaye pītisomanassameva hoti,
atk-s0508a212:86_5: evaṁ khandharogasaṅkhaye maraṇe mādisassa bhayaṁ natthi.
atk-s0508a212:87_0: Nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhāti tīhi dukkhatāhi abhibhūtā,
atk-s0508a212:87_5: Visaṁ pitvāva chaḍḍitanti pamādavasena visaṁ pivitvā tādisena payogena chaḍḍitaṁ viya maraṇe me bhayaṁ natthīti attho.
atk-s0508a212:88_0: Muttoāghātanā yathāti yathā corehi māraṇatthaṁ āghātanaṁ nīto kenaci upāyena tato mutto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0508a212:88_4: pariññādīnaṁ soḷasannaṁ kiccānaṁ katattā katakicco kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo,
atk-s0508a212:89_8: Ādittāva gharā muttoti yathā koci puriso samantato ādittato pajjalitato gehato nissaṭo,
atk-s0508a212:90_0: Yadatthi saṅgataṁ kiñcīti yaṁkiñci imasmiṁ loke atthi, vijjati,
atk-s0508a212:90_5: tassa yaṁkiñci paccayehi samacca sambhuyya kataṁ,
atk-s0508a212:90_7: Bhavo vā yattha labbhatīti yasmiṁ sattanikāye yo upapattibhavo labbhati.
atk-s0508a212:90_9: na ettha kenaci “evaṁ hotū”ti issariyaṁ vattetuṁ sakkā.
atk-s0508a212:90_10: Iti vuttaṁ mahesināti “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti evaṁ vuttaṁ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena.
atk-s0508a212:90_11: Tasmā “anissaraṁ eta”nti pajānanto maraṇasmiṁ na socatīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a212:91_0: Nagaṇhāti bhavaṁ kiñcīti yo ariyasāvako “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:91_1: tathā taṁ bhavattayaṁ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pajānāti.
atk-s0508a212:91_2: So yathā koci puriso sukhakāmo divasaṁ santattaṁ ayoguḷaṁ hatthena na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a212:91_3: evaṁ kiñci khuddakaṁ vā mahantaṁ vā bhavaṁ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0508a212:92_0: Na me hoti “ahosi”nti “atītamaddhānaṁ ahaṁ īdiso ahosi”nti attadiṭṭhivasena na me cittappavatti atthi diṭṭhiyā sammadeva ugghāṭitattā,
atk-s0508a212:92_2: “Bhavissa”nti na hoti meti tato eva “anāgatamaddhānaṁ ahaṁ ediso kathaṁ nu kho bhavissaṁ bhaveyya”nti evampi me na hoti.
atk-s0508a212:92_3: Saṅkhārā vigamissantīti evaṁ pana hoti “yathāpaccayaṁ pavattamānā saṅkhārāva,
atk-s0508a212:92_4: na ettha koci attā vā attaniyaṁ vā,
atk-s0508a212:92_8: Tattha kā paridevanāti evaṁ passantassa mādisassa tattha saṅkhāragate kā nāma paridevanā.
atk-s0508a212:93_4: Passantassa yathābhūtanti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya yāthāvato jānantassa.
atk-s0508a212:94_0: Tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṁ lokanti yathā araññe apariggahe tiṇakaṭṭhe kenaci gayhamāne aparassa “mayhaṁ santakaṁ ayaṁ gaṇhatī”ti na hoti,
atk-s0508a212:94_1: evaṁ so asāmikatāya tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṁ saṅkhāralokaṁ yadā paññāya passati,
atk-s0508a212:94_2: so tattha mamattaṁ asaṁvindaṁ asaṁvindanto alabhanto akaronto.
atk-s0508a212:95_0: Ukkaṇṭhāmi sarīrenāti asārakena abhinudena dukkhena akataññunā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlasabhāvena
atk-s0508a212:95_1: iminā kāyena ukkaṇṭhāmi imaṁ kāyaṁ nibbindanto evaṁ tiṭṭhāmi.
atk-s0508a212:95_2: Bhavenamhi anatthikoti sabbenapi bhavena anatthiko amhi,
atk-s0508a212:95_4: Soyaṁ bhijjissati kāyoti ayaṁ mama kāyo idāni tumhākaṁ payogena aññathā vā aññattha bhijjissati.
atk-s0508a212:95_5: Añño ca na bhavissatīti añño kāyo mayhaṁ āyatiṁ na bhavissati,
atk-s0508a212:96_0: Yaṁ vo kiccaṁ sarīrenāti yaṁ tumhākaṁ iminā sarīrena payojanaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:96_4: taṁ nimittaṁ imassa sarīrassa tumhehi yathicchitakiccassa karaṇahetu.
atk-s0508a212:96_5: Tatthāti tesu karontesu ca akarontesu ca.
atk-s0508a212:96_6: Doso pemañca hehitīti yathākkamaṁ paṭigho anunayo na bhavissati,
atk-s0508a212:96_7: attano bhave apekkhāya sabbaso pahīnattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a212:96_8: Aññapaccayā aññattha ca paṭighānunayesu asantesupi tappaccayā,
atk-s0508a212:97_1: Taṁ vacananti “natthi cetasikaṁ dukkha”ntiādikaṁ maraṇe bhayābhāvādidīpakaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:97_2: tato eva abbhutaṁ lomahaṁsanaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā.
atk-s0508a212:97_4: Corā hi “māṇavā”ti vuccanti “māṇavehi saha gacchanti katakammehi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0508a212:98_2: Ko vā tava ācariyo kassa sāsanaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:98_3: ovādaṁ nissāya ayaṁ asokatā maraṇakāle sokābhāvo labbhatīti etaṁ atthaṁ abravuṁ,
atk-s0508a212:99_0: Taṁ sutvā thero tesaṁ paṭivacanaṁ dento “sabbaññū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:99_1: Tattha sabbaññūti paropadesena vinā sabbapakārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino
atk-s0508a212:99_2: anāvaraṇañāṇassa adhigamena atītādibhedaṁ sabbaṁ jānātīti, sabbaññū.
atk-s0508a212:99_6: nattheva asādhāraṇañāṇapāḷiyā virodho visayuppattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṁ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
atk-s0508a212:99_8: taṁ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṁ vitthārato vuttamevāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:99_10: hīnādivibhāgabhinne sabbasmiṁ sattanikāye adhimuttavuttitāya mahatiyā karuṇāya samannāgatattā mahākāruṇiko,
atk-s0508a212:100_0: Evaṁ therena satthu sāsanassa ca guṇe pakāsite paṭiladdhasaddhā ekacce corā pabbajiṁsu,
atk-s0508a212:100_2: Tamatthaṁ dīpento dhammasaṅgāhakā “sutvāna corā”tiādinā dve gāthā abhāsiṁsu.
atk-s0508a212:100_6: Satthāni ca āvudhāni cāti asiādisatthāni ceva dhanukalāpādiāvudhāni ca.
atk-s0508a212:101_0: Te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsaneti te corā sobhanagamanatādīhi sugatassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajjaṁ upagantvā.
atk-s0508a212:101_9: paccāgantvā tehi saddhiṁ upajjhāyassa santikaṁ gantvā,
atk-s0508a212:104_0: Samaṇassa ahu cintātiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a212:104_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a212:104_3: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a212:104_4: Tassa vayappattassa gottavasena pārāpariyotveva samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0508a212:104_5: So tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṁ gato.
atk-s0508a212:104_6: Ekadivasaṁ satthu dhammadesanākāle jetavanavihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0508a212:104_7: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ oloketvā indriyabhāvanāsuttaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a212:104_12: So tathā anuvicintento āyatanamukhena vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ patto.

atk-s0508a212:148_0: “So atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇo;
atk-s0508a212:152_0: Na taṁ kiccanti maññitvā, appamatto vicakkhaṇo.
atk-s0508a212:154_0: “Yañca atthena saññuttaṁ, yā ca dhammagatā rati;
atk-s0508a212:155_0: Taṁ samādāya vattetha, sā hi ve uttamā rati.
atk-s0508a212:158_0: Hantvā vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā yo paresaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:164_0: Pañca pañcahi hantvāna, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a212:167_0: Sabbena sabbaṁ buddhassa, so naro sukhamedhatī”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a212:168_8: Pavivittassāti pavivekahetunā kilesānaṁ vikkhambhanena vivekaṁ āraddhassa,
atk-s0508a212:168_13: Sabbametaṁ thero attānaṁ paraṁ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a212:169_1: Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṁ tāva kimānupubbanti anupubbaṁ anukkamo,
atk-s0508a212:169_4: Puriso kiṁ vataṁ kiṁ samācāranti atthakāmo puriso samādiyitabbaṭṭhena “vata”nti laddhanāmaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:169_12: taṁ sampādentassa paraviheṭhanāya lesopi natthi tāya sati samaṇabhāvasseva abhāvato.
atk-s0508a212:170_6: Tatthāpi ca yasmā indriyasaṁvare siddhe sabbaṁ sīlaṁ surakkhitaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:170_8: tasmā indriyasaṁvarasīlaṁ tāva dassetukāmo indriyānaṁ arakkhaṇe rakkhaṇe ca ādīnavānisaṁse vibhāvento “indriyāni manussāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:170_10: tasmā cakkhādīni cha indriyānīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0508a212:170_15: Kathaṁ pana tāniyeva hitāya ca ahitāya hontīti āha “rakkhitānī”tiādi.
atk-s0508a212:170_18: tassa rūpādīsu abhijjhādipāpadhammapavattiyā dvārabhāvato anatthāya pihitāni,
atk-s0508a212:171_0: Indriyānevasārakkhanti yasmā indriyasaṁvaro paripuṇṇo sīlasampadaṁ paripūreti,
atk-s0508a212:171_3: tasmā indriyārakkhā attahitapaṭipattiyāva mūlanti dassento āha “indriyāneva sārakkha”nti.
atk-s0508a212:171_4: Satipubbaṅgamena ārakkhena saṁrakkhanto yonisomanasikārena indriyāni eva tāva sammadeva rakkhanto,
atk-s0508a212:171_5: yathā akusalacorā tehi tehi dvārehi pavisitvā cittasantāne kusalaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ na vilumpanti,
atk-s0508a212:171_15: ubhayenāpi vā attahitapaṭipattimeva dasseti parāviheṭhanassāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a212:171_16: Atha vā padadvayenapi attahitapaṭipattiṁ dasseti puthujjanassa sekkhassa ca parahitapaṭipattiyāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0508a212:172_0: Evaṁ rakkhitāni indriyāni hitāya hontīti vodānapakkhaṁ saṅkhepeneva dassetvā,
atk-s0508a212:172_1: arakkhitāni ahitāya hontīti saṁkilesapakkhaṁ pana vibhajitvā dassento “cakkhundriyaṁ ce”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:172_4: Anādīnavadassāvīti yo nīlapītādibhedesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu rūpāyatanesu gacchantaṁ yathāruci pavattantaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ anivārayaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:172_5: anivārayanto appaṭibāhanto tathāpavattiyaṁ ādīnavadassāvī na hoti ce,
atk-s0508a212:172_6: diṭṭhadhammikaṁ samparāyikañca ādīnavaṁ dosaṁ na passati ce.
atk-s0508a212:172_8: Tattha yo “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṁ bhavissatī”ti vuttavidhinā diṭṭhamatteyeva ṭhatvā satisampajaññavasena
atk-s0508a212:172_11: So dukkhā na hi muccatīti so evarūpo puggalo vaṭṭadukkhato na muccateva.
atk-s0508a212:172_12: Ettha ca cakkhundriyassa anivāraṇaṁ nāma yathā tena dvārena abhijjhādayo pāpadhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
atk-s0508a212:172_14: taṁ pana atthato satisampajaññassa anuṭṭhāpanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:172_20: Anussaranti assādavasena taṁ taṁ rasaṁ anuvicintento.
atk-s0508a212:172_21: Ganthitoti rasataṇhāya tasmiṁ tasmiṁ rase ganthito bandho.
atk-s0508a212:172_24: Hadayaṁ nāvabujjhatīti “dukkhassantaṁ karissāmī”ti pabbajjādikkhaṇe uppannaṁ cittaṁ na jānāti na sallakkheti,
atk-s0508a212:172_25: sāsanassa hadayaṁ abbhantaraṁ anavajjadhammānaṁ sammaddanarasataṇhāya gadhito nāvabujjhati na jānāti,
atk-s0508a212:173_5: Vividhaṁ vindate dukhanti rāgapariḷāhādivasena diṭṭhadhammikañca nirayasantāpādivasena abhisamparāyañca nānappakāraṁ dukkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0508a212:174_0: Manaṁ cetehīti manañca etehi rūpārammaṇādīhi dhammārammaṇappabhedehi ca.
atk-s0508a212:174_6: etehi yathāvuttehi rūpādīhi pañcahi dhammehi dhammārammaṇappabhedato ca.
atk-s0508a212:174_9: tato tassa arakkhaṇato naṁ puggalaṁ taṁnimittaṁ dukkhaṁ anveti,
atk-s0508a212:174_11: anugacchantañca etehi pañcahipi rūpārammaṇādīhi chaṭṭhārammaṇena saddhiṁ sabbehipi ārammaṇappaccayabhūtehi anugacchatīti.
atk-s0508a212:174_13: sotindriyañca asampattaggāhibhāvato “gacchantaṁ anivāraya”nti vuttaṁ itaraṁ sampattaggāhīti “gandhe ce paṭisevatī”tiādinā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:174_14: Tatthāpi ca rasataṇhā ca phoṭṭhabbataṇhā ca sattānaṁ visesato balavatīti “rasataṇhāya gadhito,
atk-s0508a212:175_0: Evaṁ aguttadvārassa puggalassa chahi dvārehi chasupi ārammaṇesu asaṁvaranimittaṁ uppajjanakadukkhaṁ dassetvā
atk-s0508a212:175_4: sarīraṁ nāmetaṁ pubbena lohitena ca sampuṇṇaṁ bharitaṁ aññena ca pittasemhādinā bahunā kuṇapena,
atk-s0508a212:175_5: tayidaṁ naravīrena naresu chekena sippācariyena kataṁ vaggu maṭṭhaṁ lākhāparikammādinā cittitaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:175_6: anto pana gūthādiasucibharitaṁ samuggaṁ viya chavimattamanoharaṁ bālajanasammohaṁ dukkhasabhāvatāya nirayādidukkhatāpanato ca kaṭukaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:175_10: īdise sarīre assādalobhena mahādukkhaṁ paccanubhuyyamānaṁ anavabujjhanto loko madhuragiddho khuradhārālehakapuriso viya daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0508a212:176_0: Idāni ete cakkhādīnaṁ gocarabhūtā rūpādayo vuttā,
atk-s0508a212:176_1: te visesato purisassa itthipaṭibaddhā kamanīyāti tattha saṁvaro kātabboti dassento “itthirūpe”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:176_3: Api ca yo koci itthiyā nivatthassa alaṅkārassa vā gandhavaṇṇakādīnaṁ vā piḷandhanamālānaṁ vā kāyapaṭibaddho
atk-s0508a212:176_7: Api ca itthiyā nivatthavatthassapi alaṅkataalaṅkārassapi itthipayoganipphāditā veṇuvīṇāsaṅkhapaṇavādīnampi
atk-s0508a212:176_11: Itthiyā kiṁkārapaṭissāvitādivasena assavaraso ceva paribhogaraso ca itthirasoti eke.
atk-s0508a212:176_13: yo ca tāya purisassa dinnayāgubhattādīnaṁ raso,
atk-s0508a212:176_17: Ettha ca yesaṁ itthirūpe itthisareti pāḷi,
atk-s0508a212:176_27: Cakkavattino pana itthiratanassa kāyato candanagandho vāyati,
atk-s0508a212:176_30: itthiyā sarīre ārūḷho āgantuko anulimpanādigandho “itthigandho”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0508a212:176_33: Vividhaṁ vindate dukhanti itthirūpādīsu sarāganimittaṁ diṭṭhadhammikaṁ vadhabandhanādivasena samparāyikaṁ
atk-s0508a212:177_0: Itthisotāni sabbānīti itthiyā rūpādiārammaṇāni sabbāni anavasesāni pañca taṇhāsotāni sandanti.
atk-s0508a212:177_5: evaṁ satisampajaññaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā saṁvaraṁ pavattetuṁ yo sakkoti,
atk-s0508a212:177_6: so vīriyavā āraddhavīriyo akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a212:178_0: Evaṁ rūpādigocare pabbajitassa paṭipattiṁ dassetvā idāni gahaṭṭhassa dassetuṁ “so atthavā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:178_2: so dakkho so vicakkhaṇoti so puggalo imasmiṁ loke atthavā, buddhimā,
atk-s0508a212:178_6: analaso vā vicakkhaṇo iti kattabbatāsu kusalo nāma.
atk-s0508a212:178_8: kiccaṁ dhammatthasaṁhitanti geharatiyā ramamānopi dhammatthasaṁhitaṁ dhammato atthato ca anapetameva taṁ taṁ kattabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:178_17: Ayañca nayo yesaṁ sammāpaṭipattiavirodhena tivaggatthassa vasena vattati bimbisāramahārājādīnaṁ viya,
atk-s0508a212:179_0: Atho sīdati saññuttanti yadi idhaloke supasaṁhitaṁ diṭṭhadhammikaṁ atthaṁ pariggahetvā ṭhitaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:179_1: Vajje kiccaṁ niratthakanti samparāyikattharahitaṁ anatthupasaṁhitaṁ kiccaṁ sacepi vissajjeyya pariccajeyya.
atk-s0508a212:179_3: appamatto vicakkhaṇoti satiavippavāsena appamatto vicāraṇapaññāsambhavena vicakkhaṇo anatthupasaṁhitaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:179_4: taṁ kiccaṁ mayā na kātabbanti maññitvā vivajjeyya.
atk-s0508a212:180_2: Taṁ samādāya vattethāti yaṁkiñci diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikappabhedena atthena hitena saṁyuttaṁ tadubhayahitāvahaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:180_4: tadubhayaṁ sammā ādiyitvā pariggahaṁ katvā vatteyya.
atk-s0508a212:180_5: “Sabbaṁ ratiṁ dhammarati jinātī”ti vacanato sā hi ekaṁsena uttamatthassa pāpanato uttamā rati nāma.
atk-s0508a212:181_0: Yaṁ pana kāmaratisaṁyuttaṁ kiccaṁ niratthakanti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:181_2: Tattha uccāvacehīti mahantehi ceva khuddakehi ca.
atk-s0508a212:181_10: yo puggalo kāmahetu pare hananto, ghātento,
atk-s0508a212:181_11: socento sandhicchedasandhiruhanapasayhāvahārādīhi nānupāyehi paresaṁ santakaṁ harituṁ vāyamanto sāhasākāraṁ karoti, ālopati,
atk-s0508a212:181_13: tassa taṁ kiccaṁ kāmaratisannissitaṁ anatthupasaṁhitaṁ ekantanihīnanti.
atk-s0508a212:181_14: Etena tappaṭipakkhato dhammagatāya ratiyā ekaṁsato uttamabhāvaṁyeva vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a212:182_0: Idāni yaṁ “tesamāvaraṇaṁ kātuṁ yo sakkotī”ti indriyānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:182_1: taṁ upāyena saha vibhāvento “tacchanto āṇiyā āṇiṁ,
atk-s0508a212:182_4: ñāṇabalena ca samannāgato tacchako rukkhadaṇḍagataṁ āṇiṁ nīharitukāmo tato balavatiṁ āṇiṁ koṭento tato nīharati,
atk-s0508a212:182_5: tathā kusalo bhikkhu cakkhādīni indriyāni vipassanābalena nihantukāmo indriyehi eva nihanti.
atk-s0508a212:183_6: dassanalakkhaṇaṁ paññanti imānipi vimuttiparipācakāni pañcindriyāni bhāvento vaḍḍhento etehi pañcahi
atk-s0508a212:183_7: indriyehi cakkhādīni pañcindriyāni anunayapaṭighādikilesuppattiyā dvārabhāvavihanena hantvā,
atk-s0508a212:183_9: tato eva anīgho niddukkho brāhmaṇo anupādisesaparinibbānameva yāti upagacchatīti.
atk-s0508a212:184_0: So atthavāti so yathāvutto brāhmaṇo uttamatthena samannāgatattā atthavā,
atk-s0508a212:184_2: Sabbena sabbaṁ anavasesena vidhinā anavasesaṁ buddhassa bhagavato vākyabhūtaṁ anusāsaniṁ katvā yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a212:184_3: Tato eva so naro uttamapuriso nibbānasukhañca edhati, brūheti,
atk-s0508a212:185_0: Evaṁ therena attano cintitākāravibhāvanāvasena paṭipattiyā pakāsitattā idameva cassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:188_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a212:188_3: satthu abhijātito puretaraṁyeva sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarasmiṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā telakānīti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a212:188_4: vayappatto hetusampannatāya kāme jigucchanto gharāvāsaṁ pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā vivaṭṭajjhāsayo
atk-s0508a212:188_5: “ko so pāraṅgato loke”tiādinā vimokkhapariyesanaṁ caramāno te te samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchati,
atk-s0508a212:188_8: Atha amhākaṁ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke lokahitaṁ karonte ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a212:188_9: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahatte
atk-s0508a212:188_11: So ekadivasaṁ bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ nisinno attanā adhigatavisesaṁ paccavekkhitvā tadanusārena attano paṭipattiṁ
atk-s0508a212:193_0: “Ko so pāraṅgato loke, ko patto amatogadhaṁ;
atk-s0508a212:200_0: Ko me bandhaṁ muñcaṁ loke, sambodhiṁ vedayissati.
atk-s0508a212:209_0: Passa orasikaṁ bāḷhaṁ, bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a212:217_0: “Taṁ na passāmi tekicchaṁ, yo metaṁ sallamuddhare;
atk-s0508a212:224_0: Gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṁ pāṇiñca dassaye.
atk-s0508a212:233_0: Te sote ko nivāreyya, taṁ lataṁ ko hi checchati.
atk-s0508a212:236_0: Mā te manomayo sotā, rukkhaṁva sahasā luve.
atk-s0508a212:242_0: Pādāsi vuyhamānassa, mā bhāyīti ca mabravi.
atk-s0508a212:245_0: Yaṁ taṁ pubbe amaññissaṁ, sakkāyābhirataṁ pajaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:254_0: Buddho mepānudī ganthaṁ, visadosappavāhano”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a212:255_3: kathaṁ vā adhigantabbo”ti vimuttidhammaṁ anuvicinanto gavesanto.
atk-s0508a212:255_5: pucchaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇeti te te nānātitthiye samaṇabrāhmaṇe vimuttidhammaṁ pucchanto pakatiyā anupasantasabhāvassa
atk-s0508a212:255_6: cittassa samaṁ vūpasamabhūtaṁ vaṭṭadukkhavissaraṇaṁ ariyadhammaṁ nālatthaṁ nādhigacchanti attho.
atk-s0508a212:256_1: Tattha ko so pāraṅgato loketi imasmiṁ loke titthakārapaṭiññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ko nu kho so saṁsārassa pāraṁ nibbānaṁ upagato.
atk-s0508a212:256_2: Ko patto amatogadhanti nibbānapatiṭṭhaṁ vimokkhamaggaṁ ko patto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a212:256_3: Kassa dhammaṁ paṭicchāmīti kassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā ovādadhammaṁ paṭiggaṇhāmi paṭipajjāmi.
atk-s0508a212:257_0: Antovaṅkagato āsīti vaṅkaṁ vuccati diṭṭhigataṁ manovaṅkabhāvato,
atk-s0508a212:257_4: Macchova ghasamāmisanti āmisaṁ ghasanto khādanto maccho viya,
atk-s0508a212:257_7: vepacityasuro yathāti mahindassa sakkassa pāsena baddho yathā vepacitti asurindo aserivihārī mahādukkhappatto,
atk-s0508a212:258_5: yathāpāsena baddho migo sūkaro vā mocanupāyaṁ ajānanto paripphandamāno taṁ āviñchanto bandhanaṁ daḷhaṁ karoti,
atk-s0508a212:258_6: evaṁ ahaṁ pubbe kilesapāsena paṭimukko mocanupāyaṁ ajānanto kāyasañcetanādivasena paripphandamāno taṁ na mocesiṁ,
atk-s0508a212:258_7: aññadatthu taṁ daḷhaṁ karonto sokādinā paraṁ kilesaṁ eva pāpuṇinti.
atk-s0508a212:258_9: sambodhiṁ vedayissatīti imasmiṁ loke etaṁ kilesabandhanena bandhaṁ muñcanto sambujjhati etenāti “sambodhī”ti
atk-s0508a212:258_10: laddhanāmaṁ vimokkhamaggaṁ ko me vedayissati ācikkhissatīti attho.
atk-s0508a212:259_2: pabhaṅgunaṁ vā dhammappavattiṁ ādisantaṁ kathentaṁ jarāya maccuno ca pavāhanaṁ kassa dhammaṁ paṭicchāmi.
atk-s0508a212:259_5: Vicikicchākaṅkhāganthitanti “ahosiṁ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattāya vicikicchāya āsappanaparisappanākāravuttiyā kaṅkhāya ca ganthitaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:259_7: Kodhappattamanatthaddhanti sabbattha kodhena yuttamanasā thaddhabhāvaṁ gataṁ abhijappappadāraṇaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:259_8: Icchitālābhādivasena hi taṇhā sattānaṁ cittaṁ padālentī viya pavattati.
atk-s0508a212:259_9: Dūre ṭhitassāpi vijjhanupāyatāya taṇhāva dhanu samupatiṭṭhati uppajjati etasmāti taṇhādhanusamuṭṭhānaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:259_16: bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhatīti yaṁ urasambandhanīyatāya orasikaṁ bāḷhaṁ balavataraṁ bhetvāna hadayaṁ vinivijjhitvā tasmiṁyeva hadaye tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a212:260_1: Yāva hi sakkāyadiṭṭhi santānato na vigacchati,
atk-s0508a212:260_3: Saṅkappaparatejitanti saṅkappena micchāvitakkena pare parajane nissayalakkhaṇaṁ patipatite tejitaṁ ussāhitaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:260_4: Tena viddho pavedhāmīti tena diṭṭhisallena yathā hadayaṁ āhacca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a212:260_5: evaṁ viddho pavedhāmi saṅkappāmi sassatucchedādivasena ito cito ca parivaṭṭāmi.
atk-s0508a212:260_6: Pattaṁvamāluteritanti mālutena vāyunā eritaṁ vaṇṭato muttaṁ dumapattaṁ viya.
atk-s0508a212:261_0: Ajjhattaṁ me samuṭṭhāyāti yathā loke sallaṁ nāma bāhirato uṭṭhāya ajjhattaṁ nimmathetvā bādhati,
atk-s0508a212:261_2: Idaṁ pana ajjhattaṁ me mama attabhāve samuṭṭhāya so attabhāvasaññito chaphassāyatanakāyo yathā khippaṁ sīghaṁ paccati, ḍayhati.
atk-s0508a212:261_4: Aggi viya sanissayaḍāhako taṁyeva māmakaṁ mama santakaṁ attabhāvaṁ ḍahanto yattha uppanno,
atk-s0508a212:262_0: Taṁ na passāmi tekicchanti tādisāya tikicchāya niyuttatāya tekicchaṁ sallakattaṁ bhisakkaṁ taṁ na passāmi.
atk-s0508a212:262_1: Yo metaṁ sallamuddhareti yo bhisakko etaṁ diṭṭhisallaṁ kilesasallañca uddhareyya,
atk-s0508a212:262_2: uddharanto ca nānārajjena rajjusadisasaṅkhātāya esanisalākāya pavesetvāna satthena kantitvā nāññena mantāgadappayogena
atk-s0508a212:262_3: vicikicchitaṁ sallaṁ tikicchituṁ sakkāti āharitvā yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:263_7: ko nu kho kiñci satthaṁ aggahetvā vaṇañca akaronto tato eva sabbagattāni abādhento mama hadayabbhantaragataṁ
atk-s0508a212:263_8: pīḷājananato anto tudanato anto ruddhanato ca paramattheneva sallabhūtaṁ kilesasallaṁ uddharissatīti.
atk-s0508a212:264_0: Evaṁ dasahi gāthāhi pubbe attanā cintitākāraṁ dassetvā punapi taṁ pakārantarena dassetuṁ “dhammappati hi so seṭṭho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:264_4: Visadosappavāhakoti yo mayhaṁ rāgādikilesassa pavāhako ucchinnako.
atk-s0508a212:264_6: thalaṁ pāṇiñca dassayeti ko nu kho atigambhīre saṁsāramahoghe patitassa mayhaṁ “mā bhāyī”ti assāsento
atk-s0508a212:265_0: Rahadehamasmiogāḷhoti mahati saṁsārarahade ahamasmi sasīsaṁ nimujjanavasena otiṇṇo anupaviṭṭho.
atk-s0508a212:265_1: Ahāriyarajamattiketi apanetuṁ asakkuṇeyyo rāgādirajo mattikā kaddamo etassāti ahāriyarajamattiko, rahado.
atk-s0508a212:265_9: kāyālasiyalakkhaṇaṁ middhanti ime pāpadhammā patthaṭā yaṁ rahadaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:266_2: bhantasabhāvaṁ uddhaccaṁ meghathanitaṁ meghagajjitaṁ etesanti uddhaccameghathanitā.
atk-s0508a212:266_3: Dasavidhā saṁyojanā eva valāhakā etesanti saṁyojanavalāhakā.
atk-s0508a212:266_4: Vāhā mahāudakavāhasadisā rāganissitā micchāsaṅkappā asubhādīsu ṭhitā kuddiṭṭhiṁ maṁ vahanti apāyasamuddameva uddissa kaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0508a212:267_3: kilesasototi ime pañcapisotā cakkhudvārādīnaṁ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu savanato “rūpataṇhā…pe…
atk-s0508a212:267_4: dhammataṇhā”tiādinā sabbabhāgehi vā savanato sabbadhi savanti.
atk-s0508a212:267_5: Latāti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena saṁsibbanaṭṭhena latā viyāti latā, taṇhā.
atk-s0508a212:267_6: Ubbhijja tiṭṭhatīti chahi dvārehi ubbhijjitvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0508a212:267_7: Te soteti taṇhādike sote mama santāne sandante maggasetubandhanena ko purisaviseso nivāreyya,
atk-s0508a212:268_0: Velaṁ karothāti tesaṁ sotānaṁ velaṁ setuṁ karotha sannivāraṇaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:268_2: Mā te manomayo sototi udakasoto oḷāriko,
atk-s0508a212:268_3: tassa bālamahājanenapi setuṁ katvā nivāraṇaṁ sakkā.
atk-s0508a212:268_4: Ayaṁ pana manomayo soto sukhumo dunnivāraṇo.
atk-s0508a212:268_5: So yathā udakasoto vaḍḍhanto kūle ṭhitaṁ rukkhaṁ pātetvāva nāseti,
atk-s0508a212:268_6: evaṁ tumhe apāyatīre ṭhite tattha sahasā pātetvā apāyasamuddaṁ pāpento mā luve mā vināseyya mā anayabyasanaṁ pāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a212:269_0: Evaṁ ayaṁ thero purimattabhāve parimadditasaṅkhārattā ñāṇaparipākaṁ gatattā pavattidukkhaṁ upadhārento
atk-s0508a212:269_2: tamākāraṁ dassetvā idāni jātasaṁvego kiṁkusalagavesī satthu santikaṁ gato yaṁ visesaṁ adhimucci,
atk-s0508a212:269_4: Tattha evaṁ me bhayajātassāti evaṁ vuttappakārena saṁsāre jātabhayassa apārā orimatīrato sappaṭibhayato
atk-s0508a212:269_5: saṁsāravaṭṭato “kathaṁ nu kho muñceyya”nti pāraṁ nibbānaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:269_7: tāṇo sadevakassa lokassa tāṇabhūto kilesasamucchedanī paññā āvudho etassāti paññāvudho.
atk-s0508a212:269_10: sopānanti desanāñāṇena suṭṭhu katattā abhisaṅkhatattā sukataṁ,
atk-s0508a212:269_13: vipassanāsaṅkhātaṁ sopānaṁ mahoghena vuyhamānassa mayhaṁ satthā pādāsi,
atk-s0508a212:269_14: dadanto ca “iminā te sotthi bhavissatī”ti samassāsento mā bhāyīti ca abravi, kathesi.
atk-s0508a212:270_1: catubhūmisampannaṁ satipaṭṭhānapāsādaṁ āruhitvā paccavekkhisaṁ catusaccadhammaṁ maggañāṇena patiavekkhiṁ
atk-s0508a212:270_4: sakkāyābhirataṁ pajanti evaṁ paṭividdhasacco yaṁ sakkāye “ahaṁ mamā”ti abhirataṁ pajaṁ titthiyajanaṁ
atk-s0508a212:270_7: nāvāya abhirūhananti ariyamagganāvāya abhiruhanūpāyabhūtaṁ yadā vipassanāmaggaṁ yāthāvato addakkhiṁ.
atk-s0508a212:270_8: Tato paṭṭhāya taṁ titthiyajanaṁ attānañca anadhiṭṭhāya citte aṭṭhapetvā aggahetvā titthaṁ nibbānasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0508a212:270_9: amatamahāpārassa titthabhūtaṁ ariyamaggadassanaṁ sabbehi maggehi sabbehi kusaladhammehi ukkaṭṭhaṁ addakkhiṁ,
atk-s0508a212:271_0: Evaṁ attano anuttaraṁ maggādhigamaṁ pakāsetvā idāni tassa desakaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ thomento “sallaṁ attasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:271_2: Attasamuṭṭhānanti “aha”nti mānaṭṭhānatāya “attā”ti ca laddhanāme attabhāve sambhūtaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:271_5: Etesaṁ appavattāyāti yathāvuttānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ appavattiyā anuppādāya.
atk-s0508a212:271_6: Desesi maggamuttamanti uttamaṁ seṭṭhaṁ ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:272_0: Dīgharattānusayitanti anamatagge saṁsāre cirakālaṁ santāne anu anu sayitaṁ kāraṇalābhena uppajjanārahabhāvena thāmagataṁ,
atk-s0508a212:272_1: tato ca cirarattaṁ adhiṭṭhitaṁ santānaṁ ajjhāruyha ṭhitaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:272_2: Ganthanti abhijjhākāyaganthādiṁ mama santāne ganthabhūtaṁ kilesavisadosaṁ pavāhano buddho bhagavā attano desanānubhāvena apānudī parijahāpesi,
atk-s0508a212:272_3: ganthesu hi anavasesato pahīnesu appahīno nāma kileso natthīti.
atk-s0508a212:275_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṁsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a212:275_3: vayappatto pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena dassitaṁ aparimāṇaṁ kulavaṁsānugataṁ
atk-s0508a212:275_4: dhanaṁ disvā “imaṁ ettakaṁ dhanarāsiṁ mayhaṁ pituayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṁ gahetvā gantuṁ nāsakkhiṁsu,
atk-s0508a212:275_5: mayā pana gahetvā gantuṁ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṁ mahādānaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a212:275_6: So abhiññālābhiṁ ekaṁ tāpasaṁ upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce niyojito yāvajīvaṁ puññāni katvā tato
atk-s0508a212:275_7: cuto devaloke nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṁ anubhavanto tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke
atk-s0508a212:275_8: bhinnaṁ raṭṭhaṁ sandhāretuṁ samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a212:276_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātaṁ khemantabhūmiṁ sampāpesi.
atk-s0508a212:276_1: Atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā satthāraṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a212:276_3: Tena kho pana samayena satthā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ saddhāpabbajitānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a212:276_4: Taṁ disvā so pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṁ ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato mahatā
atk-s0508a212:276_5: sakkārena sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a212:276_6: Satthā tassa anantarāyena ijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṁ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0508a212:276_7: So satthāraṁ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a212:276_8: So tattha yāvatāyukaṁ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa
atk-s0508a212:276_9: bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṁ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṁ puññakiriyāya
atk-s0508a212:277_0: Evaṁ tattha tattha bhave taṁ taṁ bahuṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a212:277_2: tassa bhinnaṁ raṭṭhaṁ sandhāretuṁ samatthe kule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti vaṁsānugatameva nāmaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a212:277_3: So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanapatto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṁyojito mahante
atk-s0508a212:277_4: ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisaṁ sampattiṁ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0508a212:277_5: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṁ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṁ anupāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a212:277_6: Taṁ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a212:277_7: pabbajitukāmo sattāhaṁ bhattacchedaṁ katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a212:277_8: pabbajjaṁ yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṁ karonto
atk-s0508a212:285_0: Sabbe jane hāsayanto, desesi amataṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:295_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a212:303_0: Kheḷapiṇḍeva bhogamhi, pemaṁ mayhaṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a212:308_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthāraṁ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro passituṁ thullakoṭṭhikaṁ gantvā,
atk-s0508a212:308_1: tattha sapadānaṁ piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṁ kummāsaṁ labhitvā taṁ amataṁ viya paribhuñjanto,
atk-s0508a212:308_3: dutiyadivase pitu nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthāgārajane upagantvā “kīdisā nāma tā,
atk-s0508a212:308_6: yāsaṁ tvaṁ hetu brahmacariyaṁ carasī”tiādīni vatvā,
atk-s0508a212:308_7: palobhanakammaṁ kātuṁ āraddhe tassa adhippāyaṁ parivattetvā aniccatādipaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammaṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a212:311_0: Āturaṁ bahusaṅkappaṁ, yassa natthi dhuvaṁ ṭhiti.
atk-s0508a212:314_0: Aṭṭhiṁ tacena onaddhaṁ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
atk-s0508a212:317_0: Alaṁ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a212:320_0: Alaṁ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a212:323_0: Alaṁ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0508a212:329_0: Bhutvā nivāpaṁ gacchāma, socante migaluddake”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a212:330_2: Bimbanti dīghādibhāvena yuttaṭṭhānesu dīghādīhi aṅgapaccaṅgehi maṇḍitaṁ attabhāvaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:330_3: Arukāyanti navannaṁ vaṇamukhānaṁ lomakūpānañca vasena vissandamānaasuciṁ,
atk-s0508a212:330_4: sabbaso ca arubhūtaṁ vaṇabhūtaṁ arūnaṁ vā kāyaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:330_6: Āturanti sabbakālaṁ iriyāpathantarādīhi pariharitabbatāya niccaṁ gilānaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:330_7: Bahusaṅkappanti bālajanena abhūtaṁ āropetvā bahudhā saṅkappitabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:330_8: Yassa natthi dhuvaṁ ṭhitīti yassa kāyassa dhuvabhāvo ṭhitisabhāvo natthi,
atk-s0508a212:331_5: ākāso parivārito ‘rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”tiādīsu rūpanti vuccati.
atk-s0508a212:331_6: Maṇinā kuṇḍalena cāti sīsūpagādiābharaṇagatena maṇinā kuṇḍalena cittakataṁ.
atk-s0508a212:331_7: Aṭṭhiṁ tacena onaddhanti allacammena pariyonaddhaṁ atirekatisatapabhedaṁ aṭṭhiṁ passāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a212:331_10: Saha vatthehi sobhatīti tayidaṁ rūpaṁ maṇinā cittakatampi vatthehi paṭicchāditameva sobhati,
atk-s0508a212:332_3: yaṁ maṇḍanamanuyuttā sāsapakakkena mukhapīḷakādīni haritvā loṇamattikāya duṭṭhalohitaṁ haritvā mukhacuṇṇakavilepanaṁ karonti,
atk-s0508a212:332_5: Alanti bālassa andhaputhujjanassa noca pāragavesino vaṭṭābhiratassa mohāya sammohanāya samatthaṁ tassa cittaṁ mohetuṁ pariyattaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:332_6: pāragavesino pana vivaṭṭābhiratassa no alaṁ na pariyattaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:333_0: Aṭṭhāpadakatāti aṭṭhapadākārena katā sañcitā purimabhāge kese kappetvā nalāṭassa paṭicchādanavasena katā kesaracanā aṭṭhapadaṁ nāma,
atk-s0508a212:333_2: Nettā añjanamakkhitāti ubhopi nayanāni anto dvīsu antesu ca yathā añjanacchāyā dissati,
atk-s0508a212:334_1: pūtikāyo alaṅkatoti yathā añjanī añjananāḷikā navā abhinavā mālākammamakaradantādivasena cittā bahi maṭṭhā ujjalā dassanīyā,
atk-s0508a212:334_3: evameva tāsaṁ kāyo nhānabbhañjanavatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkato bahi ujjalo,
atk-s0508a212:334_4: anto pana pūti nānappakāraasucīhi bharito tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0508a212:335_6: Upamā kho ayaṁ therena katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
atk-s0508a212:335_8: yathā migānaṁ māraṇatthāya daṇḍavāguraṁ oḍḍetvā tattha nivāpaṁ vikiriya migaluddake nilīne ṭhite tattheko
atk-s0508a212:335_9: javaparakkamasampanno cheko migo pāsaṁ aphusanto eva yathāsukhaṁ nivāpaṁ khāditvā,
atk-s0508a212:335_10: “vañcesi vata migo”ti migaluddake viravante eva gacchati.
atk-s0508a212:335_11: Aparo migo balavā cheko javasampannova tattha gantvā nivāpaṁ khāditvā tattha tattha pāsaṁ chinditvā,
atk-s0508a212:335_13: pāso chinno”ti migaluddake socante eva gacchati,
atk-s0508a212:335_14: evaṁ mayampi pubbe puthujjanakāle mātāpitūhi āsajjanatthāya niyyādite bhoge bhuñjitvā tattha tattha asajjamānā nikkhantā.
atk-s0508a212:335_15: Idāni pana sabbaso chinnakilesā apāsā hutvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0508a212:335_16: tehi dinnabhojanaṁ bhuñjitvā tesu socantesu eva gacchāmāti.
atk-s0508a212:336_2: attanā pubbe bhuttabhoge ca idāni bhuttabhojanañca nivāpatiṇaṁ viya,
atk-s0508a212:336_3: attānaṁ mahāmigaṁ viya ca katvā dasseti.
atk-s0508a212:336_4: Imā gāthā vatvā vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa migājinauyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi.
atk-s0508a212:336_5: Therassa kira pitā sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu aggaḷaṁ dāpetvā malle āṇāpesi “nikkhamituṁ mā detha,
atk-s0508a212:336_8: Atha rājā korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṁ sutvā taṁ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā “idha,
atk-s0508a212:336_10: pabbajanto byādhipārijuññaṁ vā jarābhogañātipārijuññaṁ vā patto pabbajati.
atk-s0508a212:336_11: Tvaṁ pana kiñcipi pārijuññaṁ anupagato eva kasmā pabbajito”ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a212:336_16: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso”ti imesaṁ catunnaṁ dhammuddesānaṁ attānaṁ vivittabhāvaṁ kathetvā tassā desanāya anugītiṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a212:338_0: “Passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṁ na dadanti mohā;
atk-s0508a212:339_0: Luddhā dhanaṁ sannicayaṁ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti.
atk-s0508a212:342_0: Oraṁ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṁ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0508a212:344_0: “Rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṁ upenti;
atk-s0508a212:345_0: Ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṁ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti.
atk-s0508a212:347_0: “Kandanti naṁ ñātī pakiriya kese, ‘aho vatā no amarā’ti cāhu;
atk-s0508a212:348_0: Vatthena naṁ pārutaṁ nīharitvā, citaṁ samodhāya tato ḍahanti.
atk-s0508a212:350_0: “So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthena pahāya bhoge;
atk-s0508a212:351_0: Na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā.
atk-s0508a212:353_0: “Dāyādakā tassa dhanaṁ haranti, satto pana gacchati yenakammaṁ;
atk-s0508a212:354_0: Na mīyamānaṁ dhanamanveti kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:356_0: “Na dīghamāyuṁ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṁ vihanti;
atk-s0508a212:357_0: Appaṁ hidaṁ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṁ vippariṇāmadhammaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:359_0: “Aḍḍhā daliddā ca phusanti phassaṁ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho;
atk-s0508a212:360_0: Bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho.
atk-s0508a212:362_0: “Tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati;
atk-s0508a212:363_0: Abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
atk-s0508a212:366_0: Tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:368_0: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo;
atk-s0508a212:369_0: Evaṁ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
atk-s0508a212:371_0: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṁ;
atk-s0508a212:372_0: Ādīnavaṁ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṁ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0508a212:374_0: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0508a212:375_0: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṁ sāmaññameva seyyo.
atk-s0508a212:378_0: Avañjhā mayhaṁ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:384_0: Sohaṁ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:390_0: So me attho anuppatto, sabbasaṁyojanakkhayo”ti. – imā gāthā avoca;
atk-s0508a212:391_1: imasmiṁ loke sadhane dhanasampanne aḍḍhe manusse passāmi,
atk-s0508a212:391_2: te pana laddhāna vittaṁ dhanaṁ labhitvā bhogasampattiyaṁ ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇādīsu kassaci kiñcipi na dadanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a212:391_4: Luddhā lobhābhibhūtā yathāladdhaṁ dhanaṁ sannicayaṁ sabbaso nicetabbaṁ nidhetabbaṁ karonti.
atk-s0508a212:391_5: Bhiyyova yathādhigatakāmato upari kāme kāmaguṇe “tathāhaṁ edise ca bhoge paṭilabheyya”nti abhipatthayanti paccāsīsanti tajjañca vāyāmaṁ karonti.
atk-s0508a212:392_1: Tattha pasayhappathaviṁ vijetvāti attano vaṁsānugataṁ pathaviṁ balakkārena abhivijiya.
atk-s0508a212:392_3: Oraṁ samuddassāti anavasesaṁ samuddassa orabhāgaṁ labhitvāpi tena atittarūpo pāraṁ samuddassa dīpantarampi patthayeyya.
atk-s0508a212:393_2: Kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi tittīti taṇhāvipannānaṁ imasmiṁ loke vatthukāmehi titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0508a212:394_0: Kandanti nanti matapurisaṁ uddissa tassa guṇe kittentā kandanaṁ karonti.
atk-s0508a212:394_1: Aho vatā no amarāti cāhūti aho vata amhākaṁ ñātī amarā siyunti ca kathenti,
atk-s0508a212:395_0: So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamānoti so matasatto chavaḍāhakehi sammā jhāpetuṁ sūlehi tujjamāno.
atk-s0508a212:397_0: “Na dīghamāyu”ntiādinā kāmaguṇassa jarāya ca paṭikārābhāvaṁ vatvā puna tassa ekantikabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ “appaṁ hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:397_3: Phassaṁ bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭhoti yathā bālo iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamphassaṁ phuṭṭho,
atk-s0508a212:397_7: bālo hi bālyā vadhitova setīti bālapuggalo kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho socanto kilamanto urattāḷiṁ
atk-s0508a212:397_8: kandanto bālabhāvena vadhito pīḷitova hutvā seti sayati.
atk-s0508a212:397_9: Ito cito ca āvaṭṭanto vivaṭṭanto virodhento vedhati phassaphuṭṭhoti dhīro pana paṇḍito dukkhasamphassena
atk-s0508a212:397_10: samphuṭṭho na vedhati kampanamattampi tassa na hotīti.
atk-s0508a212:398_0: Tasmāti yasmā bālapaṇḍitānaṁ lokadhamme edisī pavatti,
atk-s0508a212:398_3: yāya paññāya vosānaṁ bhavassa pariyosānabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ adhigacchati.
atk-s0508a212:399_1: saṁsāramāpajja paramparāyāti yo pāpāni katvā aparāparaṁ saṁsaraṇamāpajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṁ
atk-s0508a212:399_3: tassa pāpakammakārino puggalassa kiriyaṁ abhisaddahanto “attā ca me hotī”ti pattiyāyanto aññopi appapañño
atk-s0508a212:399_4: bālo yathā paṭipajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:400_0: Coro yathāti yathā coro pāpadhammo gharasandhiṁ chindanto sandhimukhe ārakkhakapurisehi gahito sakammunā
atk-s0508a212:400_1: tena attano sandhicchedakammunā kāraṇabhūtena kasādīhi tāḷanādivasena haññati rājapurisehi bādhiyyati
atk-s0508a212:400_3: Evaṁ pajāti evamayaṁ sattaloko idha pāpāni karitvā pecca patvā tena kammunā paramhi loke nirayādīsu haññati,
atk-s0508a212:401_0: Evametāhi ekādasahi gāthāhi yathārahaṁ cattāro dhammuddese pakāsetvā idāni kāmesu saṁsāre ca ādīnavaṁ

atk-s0508a212:575_0: Tato tepi māṇavakā hetusampannatāya tattheva pabbajjāpekkhā hutvā –
atk-s0508a212:579_0: Gāthamāhaṁsu, yathā taṁ tena saddhiṁ katādhikārā kulaputtā.
atk-s0508a212:580_0: Atha selo tesu māṇavakesu tuṭṭhacitto te dassento pabbajjañca yācamāno –
atk-s0508a212:583_0: Brahmacariyaṁ carissāma, bhagavā tava santike”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a212:584_0: Tato bhagavā yasmā selo heṭṭhā vuttanayena padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tesaṁyeva tiṇṇaṁ purisasatānaṁ gaṇajeṭṭho hutvā ropitakusalamūlo,
atk-s0508a212:584_1: idāni pacchimabhavepi tesaṁyeva ācariyo hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0508a212:584_4: tasmā te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjāya pabbājento –
atk-s0508a212:587_0: Yattha amoghā pabbajjā, appamattassa sikkhato”ti. – gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a212:588_4: yatthāti vā yasmiṁ sāsane appamattassa sativippavāsarahitassa tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhato.
atk-s0508a212:589_2: Tāvadeva te sabbe iddhimayapattacīvaradharā hutvā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā parivāresuṁ.
atk-s0508a212:589_3: So evaṁ pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto sattame divase sapariso arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a212:598_0: “Uggā ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0508a212:618_0: “Te me sutvāna vacanaṁ, gaṇaṁ bandhiṁsu tāvade;
atk-s0508a212:624_0: “Ime tīṇi satā vīra, purisā ekato gaṇā;
atk-s0508a212:627_0: Tiṇṇaṁ satānaṁ purato, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a212:639_0: Pacchime bhave sampatte, vāseṭṭho nāma brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0508a212:641_0: Selo iti mamaṁ nāmaṁ, chaḷaṅge pāramiṁ gato.
atk-s0508a212:645_0: Āvāho vā vivāho vā, rājā vā te nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:647_0: Na nimantemi rājānaṁ, āhutī me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a212:648_0: “Na catthi mayhamāvāho, vivāho me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a212:651_0: So me nimantito ajja, tassetaṁ paṭiyādanaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:655_0: Vijjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:659_0: Sīhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:661_0: Nāgūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:663_0: Usabhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:665_0: Sakkūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:666_0: “Vasī gaṇī patāpī ca, tejassī ca durāsado;
atk-s0508a212:667_0: Brahmūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:669_0: Dharaṇūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:671_0: Udadhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:673_0: Nerūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:675_0: Gaganūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:677_0: Assāsako mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:679_0: Ratanākaro mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:681_0: Meghūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:683_0: Sūriyūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:685_0: Candūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:687_0: Appameyyo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:689_0: Vimutti asadisā yassa, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:691_0: Yassa parakkamo jeṭṭho, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:692_0: “Rāgo doso ca moho ca, visā sabbe samūhatā;
atk-s0508a212:693_0: Agadūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:695_0: Vejjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito.
atk-s0508a212:697_0: Buddho buddhoti sutvāna, pīti me udapajjatha.
atk-s0508a212:700_0: “Kahaṁ nu kho so bhagavā, lokajeṭṭho narāsabho;
atk-s0508a212:709_0: Gāvī yathā vacchagiddhā, evāhaṁ viciniṁ jinaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:715_0: Mattova kuñjaro dantī, evaṁ buddhā durāsadā.
atk-s0508a212:731_0: Buddhoti niṭṭhaṁ gantvāna, saha sissehi pabbajiṁ.
atk-s0508a212:737_0: Tena kammena sukatena, aṭṭha hetū labhāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:738_0: “Disāsu pūjito homi, bhogā ca amitā mama;
atk-s0508a212:739_0: Patiṭṭhā homi sabbesaṁ, tāso mama na vijjati.
atk-s0508a212:740_0: “Byādhayo me na vijjanti, dīghāyuṁ pālayāmi ca;
atk-s0508a212:745_0: Aṭṭha gopānasī nāma, tava putto mahāmuni.
atk-s0508a212:747_0: Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:749_0: Ādeyyavacano homi, na dhaṁsemi yathā ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:750_0: “Abhantaṁ hoti me cittaṁ, akhilo homi kassaci;
atk-s0508a212:751_0: Tena kammena sukatena, vimalo homi sāsane.
atk-s0508a212:753_0: Sāvako te mahāvīra, bhikkhu taṁ vandate muni.
atk-s0508a212:755_0: Tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:757_0: Sabbasampattiko homi, maccheraṁ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a212:763_0: Tena kammena sukatena, pāvisiṁ abhayaṁ puraṁ.
atk-s0508a212:766_0: “Ye keci damakā loke, hatthiasse damenti ye;
atk-s0508a212:767_0: Karitvā kāraṇā nānā, dāruṇena damenti te.
atk-s0508a212:777_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a212:781_2: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhuma bhagavā yasmā mayaṁ ito atīte aṭṭhame divase taṁ saraṇaṁ agamimha.
atk-s0508a212:781_3: Tasmā sattarattena tava sāsane damakena dantā amha,
atk-s0508a212:783_0: “Tuvaṁ buddho tuvaṁ satthā, tuvaṁ mārābhibhū muni;
atk-s0508a212:784_0: Tuvaṁ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresimaṁ pajaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:788_0: Imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā osānagāthāya satthāraṁ vandanaṁ yācati –
atk-s0508a212:791_0: Pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno”ti.
atk-s0508a212:792_0: Tattha tuvaṁ buddhoti tvameva imasmiṁ loke sabbaññubuddho.
atk-s0508a212:792_9: Evaṁ vatvā thero sapariso satthāraṁ abhivandatīti.
atk-s0508a212:795_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto
atk-s0508a212:795_3: ekadivasaṁ satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthārā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ uccākulikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṁ
atk-s0508a212:795_4: disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā sattāhaṁ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṁ datvā paṇidhānaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a212:795_6: Sopi taṁ byākaraṇaṁ sutvā uccākulikasaṁvattanikaṁ kammaṁ pucchitvā dhammassavanassa kārāpanaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:795_10: uposathāgāre paṭissayadānanti evamādiṁ yāvajīvaṁ bahupuññaṁ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a212:795_11: kassapassa bhagavato aparabhāge amhākaṁ bhagavato uppattiyā puretaraṁ bārāṇasiyaṁ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto
atk-s0508a212:795_12: sambahule paccekabuddhe piṇḍāya caritvā ekasmiṁyeva ṭhāne samāgantvā bhattavissaggaṁ karonte disvā tattha
atk-s0508a212:795_13: pāsāṇaphalakāni attharitvā pādodakādiṁ upaṭṭhapento yāvajīvaṁ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0508a212:796_0: So ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a212:796_2: So vayappatto anuruddhādīhi pañcahi khattiyehi saddhiṁ satthari anupiyambavane viharante satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a212:796_3: Taṁ satthā aparabhāge jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno uccākulikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a212:796_4: So phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi “aho sukhaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:796_10: Satthā taṁ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhaddiya,
atk-s0508a212:796_16: Idāni pana pabbajito abhīto anubbiggo anussaṅkito viharāmī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0508a212:853_0: Imāhi gāthāhi satthu purato sīhanādaṁ nadi.
atk-s0508a212:854_1: pubbe mayā gacchantenāpi hatthigīvāya hatthikkhandhe nisīditvā yātaṁ caritaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:854_2: Vatthāni pariharantenāpi sukhumā sukhasamphassā kāsikavatthavisesā dhāritā.
atk-s0508a212:854_3: Odanaṁ bhuñjantenāpi tivassikānaṁ purāṇagandhasālīnaṁ odano tittirakapiñjarādinā sucinā maṁsena upasittatāya sucimaṁsūpasecano bhutto,
atk-s0508a212:854_4: tathāpi taṁ sukhaṁ na mayhaṁ cittaparitosakaraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0508a212:854_5: yathā etarahi vivekasukhanti dassento āha “sojja bhaddo”tiādi.
atk-s0508a212:854_9: Sojjāti so ajja etarahi pabbajjāyaṁ ṭhito.
atk-s0508a212:854_12: Uñchāpattāgate ratoti uñchācariyāya patte āgate pattapariyāpanne abhirato,
atk-s0508a212:854_15: Putto godhāyāti kāḷigodhāya nāma khattiyāya putto.
atk-s0508a212:854_16: Bhaddiyoti evaṁnāmo attānameva thero aññaṁ viya katvā vadati.
atk-s0508a212:855_14: Vitthārato pana dhutaṅgakathā visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva gahetabbā.
atk-s0508a212:856_3: Daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhaketi thirehi aṭṭālehi dvārakoṭṭhakehi ca samannāgate,
atk-s0508a212:857_0: Satiṁ paññañcāti ettha satisīsena samādhiṁ vadati.
atk-s0508a212:858_0: Evaṁ thero satthu sammukhā sīhanādaṁ nadi. Taṁ sutvā bhikkhū abhippasannā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a212:861_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a212:861_3: sāvatthiyaṁ kosalarañño purohitassa bhaggavassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0508a212:861_5: rañño ca maṅgalāvudhaṁ sayanapīṭhe ṭhapitaṁ pajjali,
atk-s0508a212:861_6: taṁ disvā rājā bhīto saṁviggo niddaṁ na labhi.
atk-s0508a212:861_7: Purohito tāyaṁ velāyaṁ nakkhattayogaṁ ullokento “coranakkhattena jāto”ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a212:861_8: So vibhātāya rattiyā rañño santikaṁ gato sukhaseyyaṁ pucchi.
atk-s0508a212:861_12: tassa ko nu kho vipāko bhavissatī”ti?
atk-s0508a212:861_25: Tassa nāmaṁ karontā yasmā jāyamāno rañño cittaṁ vihesento jāto,
atk-s0508a212:861_26: tasmā hiṁsakoti katvā pacchā diṭṭhaṁ adiṭṭhanti viya ahiṁsakoti vohariṁsu.
atk-s0508a212:862_0: So vayappatto pubbakammabalena sattannaṁ hatthīnaṁ balaṁ dhāreti.
atk-s0508a212:862_2: buddhasuññe loke kassako hutvā nibbatto ekaṁ paccekabuddhaṁ vassodakena tintaṁ allacīvaraṁ sītapīḷitaṁ
atk-s0508a212:862_3: attano khettabhūmiṁ upagataṁ disvā “puññakkhettaṁ me upaṭṭhita”nti somanassajāto aggiṁ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a212:862_4: So tassa kammassa balena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne thāmajavabalasampanno ca hutvā imasmiṁ pacchimattabhāve sattannaṁ hatthīnaṁ balaṁ dhāreti.
atk-s0508a212:862_5: So takkasilaṁ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike dhammantevāsī hutvā sippaṁ uggaṇhato ācariyabrāhmaṇaṁ tassa bhariyañca sakkaccaṁ paṭijaggati.
atk-s0508a212:862_6: Tenassa sā brāhmaṇī gehe labbhamānena bhattādinā saṅgahaṁ karoti.
atk-s0508a212:862_7: Taṁ asahamānā aññe māṇavā ācariyena saddhiṁ bhedaṁ akaṁsu.
atk-s0508a212:862_8: Brāhmaṇo tesaṁ vacanaṁ dve tayo vāre asaddahanto hutvā pacchā saddahitvā “mahābalo māṇavo,
atk-s0508a212:862_10: upāyena naṁ māressāmī”ti cintetvā niṭṭhitasippaṁ attano nagaraṁ gantuṁ āpucchantaṁ māṇavaṁ āha –
atk-s0508a212:862_12: niṭṭhitasippena nāma antevāsinā ācariyassa garudakkhiṇā dātabbā,
atk-s0508a212:862_17: bahūsu māriyamānesu ekantato eko naṁ māreyyāti.
atk-s0508a212:862_18: Taṁ sutvā ahiṁsako attano ciraparicitaṁ nikkaruṇataṁ purakkhatvā sannaddhapañcāvudho kosalarañño vijite
atk-s0508a212:862_19: jālinaṁ vanaṁ pavisitvā mahāmaggasamīpe pabbatantare vasanto pabbatasikhare ṭhatvā maggena gacchante
atk-s0508a212:862_20: manusse oloketvā vegena gantvā aṅguliyo gahetvā rukkhagge olambesi.
atk-s0508a212:862_23: Evaṁ gaṇanāya aparipūramānāya laddhā laddhā aṅguliyo suttena ganthitvā mālaṁ katvā yaññopacitaṁ viya aṁse olambesi.
atk-s0508a212:863_0: Evaṁ tasmiṁ manusse mārente maggo avaḷañjo ahosi.
atk-s0508a212:863_1: So magge manusse alabhanto gāmūpacāraṁ gantvā nilīyitvā āgatāgate manusse māretvā aṅguliyo gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0508a212:863_5: Evaṁ tena so padeso ubbāsito ahosi.
atk-s0508a212:863_6: Aṅgulimālassa ca ekāya ūnā sahassaaṅguliyo saṅgahā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a212:863_7: Atha manussā taṁ corupaddavaṁ kosalarañño ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0508a212:863_11: Taṁ sutvā aṅgulimālassa mātā mantāṇī nāma brāhmaṇī tassa pitaraṁ āha –
atk-s0508a212:863_12: “putto kira te coro hutvā idañcidañca karoti,
atk-s0508a212:863_16: rājā yaṁ vā taṁ vā karotū”ti āha.
atk-s0508a212:863_17: Atha brāhmaṇī puttasinehena pātheyyaṁ gahetvā “mama puttaṁ saññāpetvā ānessāmī”ti maggaṁ paṭipajji.
atk-s0508a212:864_5: mahājāni abhavissā”ti ñatvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sayameva pattacīvaraṁ gahetvā aṅgulimālaṁ
atk-s0508a212:864_6: uddissa tiṁsayojanikaṁ maggaṁ padasāva paṭipajjamāno antarāmagge gopālakādīhi vāriyamānopi jālinaṁ vanaṁ
atk-s0508a212:864_8: Tasmiñca khaṇe tassa mātā tena diṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a212:864_9: so mātaraṁ dūratova disvā “mātarampi māretvā ajja ūnaṅguliṁ pūressāmī”ti asiṁ ukkhipitvā upadhāvi.
atk-s0508a212:864_10: Tesaṁ ubhinnaṁ antare bhagavā attānaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a212:864_11: Aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṁ disvā “kiṁ me mātaraṁ vadhitvā aṅguliyā gahitena?
atk-s0508a212:864_13: yaṁnūnāhaṁ imaṁ samaṇaṁ jīvitā voropetvā aṅguliṁ gaṇheyya”nti ukkhittāsiko bhagavantaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0508a212:864_14: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi,
atk-s0508a212:864_15: yathā pakatiiriyāpathena gacchantampi attānaṁ aṅgulimālo sabbathāmena dhāvantopi na sakkoti sampāpuṇituṁ.
atk-s0508a212:864_16: So parihīnajavo ghurughurupassāsī kacchehi sedaṁ muñcanto padaṁ uddharitumpi asakkonto khāṇu viya ṭhito bhagavantaṁ “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha,
atk-s0508a212:864_27: pucchitvā naṁ jānissāmī”ti bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0508a212:866_0: “Gacchaṁ vadesi samaṇa ṭhitomhi, mamañca brūsi ṭhitamaṭṭhitoti;
atk-s0508a212:867_0: Pucchāmi taṁ samaṇa etamatthaṁ, kathaṁ ṭhito tvaṁ ahamaṭṭhitomhī”ti.
atk-s0508a212:868_7: tasmā taṁ samaṇaṁ ahaṁ evamatthaṁ pucchāmi.
atk-s0508a212:870_0: “Ṭhito ahaṁ aṅgulimāla sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṁ;
atk-s0508a212:871_0: Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosi, tasmā ṭhitohaṁ tuvamaṭṭhitosī”ti. –
atk-s0508a212:873_4: ahaṁ sabbadā sabbakāle ādimajjhapariyosānesu tasathāvarabhedesu sabbesu sattesu daṇḍaṁ nidhāya nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno,
atk-s0508a212:873_6: Tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosīti tvaṁ pana sattesu saññamarahito asi,
atk-s0508a212:873_9: Tato eva tāsu tāsu gatīsu paribbhamanatopi tuvaṁ idāni iriyāpathena ṭhitopi aṭṭhito asi,
atk-s0508a212:873_11: Tato aṅgulimālo yathābhuccaguṇappabhāvitassa jalatale telassa viya sakalaṁ lokaṁ abhibyāpetvā ṭhitassa
atk-s0508a212:873_12: bhagavato kittisaddassa sutapubbattā hetusampattiyā ñāṇassa ca paripākagatattā “ayaṁ so bhagavā”ti sañjātapītisomanasso
atk-s0508a212:875_0: “Cirassaṁ vata me mahito mahesī, mahāvanaṁ samaṇo paccapādi;
atk-s0508a212:876_0: Sohaṁ cajissāmi sahassapāpaṁ, sutvāna gāthaṁ tava dhammayutta”nti. –
atk-s0508a212:878_2: Mahitoti sadevakena lokena mahatiyā pūjāya pūjito.

atk-s0508a212:1212_7: kilesavatthūsu “yo yo kileso yaṁ yaṁ sattaṁ gaṇhāti abhibhavati,
atk-s0508a212:1212_8: so so tassa tassa hotū”ti kilesasenāpatinā mārena sasaṅgāme ghosite viya.
atk-s0508a212:1212_9: Tehi tehi kilesehi abhibhūtā te bālaputhujjanā tena tena ārammaṇabhāgena vidhāvitā vositāti.
atk-s0508a212:1213_0: Te evaṁ vidhāvitā kiṁ karontīti āha “pariccajitvā saddhammaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:1213_3: paṭipattisaddhammaṁ chaḍḍetvā āmisakiñjakkhahetu aññamaññehi bhaṇḍare kalahaṁ karontīti.
atk-s0508a212:1213_8: vohāramattamevā”ti ca evamādīni diṭṭhigatāni micchāgāhe anventā anugacchantā idaṁ seyyo idameva seṭṭhaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:1214_2: Taṁ dadantassa gahaṭṭhassa ananulomikasaṁsaggavasena akiccāni pabbajitena akattabbāni kammāni nisevare karonti.
atk-s0508a212:1215_0: Udarāvadehakaṁ bhutvāti “ūnūdaro mitāhāro”ti vuttavacanaṁ acintetvā udarapūraṁ bhuñjitvā.
atk-s0508a212:1215_1: Sayantuttānaseyyakāti “dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappeti pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno”ti vuttavidhānaṁ ananussaritvā uttānaseyyakā sayanti.
atk-s0508a212:1215_2: Yā kathā satthugarahitāti rājakathāditiracchānakathaṁ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a212:1216_0: Sabbakārukasippānīti sabbehi vessādīhi kārukehi kattabbāni bhattatālavaṇṭakaraṇādīni hatthasippāni.
atk-s0508a212:1216_2: Avūpasantā ajjhattanti kilesavūpasamābhāvato gadduhanamattampi samādhānābhāvato ca ajjhattaṁ avūpasantā,
atk-s0508a212:1216_5: Atiacchatīti tesaṁ ājīvakiccapasutatāya ekadesampi aphusanato visuṁyeva nisīdati,
atk-s0508a212:1217_0: Mattikanti pākatikaṁ vā pañcavaṇṇaṁ vā gihīnaṁ viniyogakkhamaṁ mattikaṁ.
atk-s0508a212:1217_4: Ākaṅkhantā bahuttaranti bahuṁ piṇḍapātādiuttaruttaraṁ ākaṅkhantā “amhehi mattikādīsu dinnesu manussā
atk-s0508a212:1217_5: daḷhabhattikā hutvā bahuṁ uttaruttaraṁ catupaccayajātaṁ dassantī”ti adhippāyena gihīnaṁ upanāmentīti attho.
atk-s0508a212:1218_8: Sabbattha gihīnaṁ upanāmenti ākaṅkhantā bahuttaranti yojanā.
atk-s0508a212:1219_0: Bhesajjesu yathā vejjāti gihīnaṁ bhesajjappayogesu yathā vejjā,
atk-s0508a212:1219_2: Kiccākicce yathā gihīti gahaṭṭhānaṁ khuddake ceva mahante ca kicce kattabbe gihī viya.
atk-s0508a212:1219_3: Gaṇikāva vibhūsāyanti attano sarīrassa vibhūsane rūpūpajīviniyo viya.
atk-s0508a212:1219_4: Issare khattiyā yathāti issare issariyapavattane yathā khattiyā,
atk-s0508a212:1220_7: Bahūhi parikappehīti yathāvuttehi aññehi ca bahūhi micchājīvappakārehi.
atk-s0508a212:1222_5: No ca dhammatoti dhammanimittaṁ no ca upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0508a212:1222_6: Yo satthārā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitāya parisāya saṅgaho anuññāto,
atk-s0508a212:1222_10: ‘dhammakathiko’ti evaṁ sambhāvento mahājano mayhaṁ lābhasakkāre upanayissatī”ti icchācāre ṭhatvā lābhanimittaṁ paresaṁ dhammaṁ desenti.
atk-s0508a212:1222_11: No ca atthatoti yo so vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṁ kathentena pattabbo attho,
atk-s0508a212:1223_4: Paralābhopajīvantāti sāsane lābhassa andhabālaputhujjanehi pare sīlādiguṇasampanne sekkhe uddissa uppannattā taṁ paralābhaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:1223_5: parato vā dāyakato laddhabbalābhaṁ upajīvantā bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū pāpajigucchāya abhāvato ahirikā samānā ca “mayaṁ paralābhaṁ bhuñjāma,
atk-s0508a212:1224_1: Tathāti yathā pubbe vuttā bandhanakārakādayo, tathā.
atk-s0508a212:1224_3: Muṇḍā saṅghāṭipārutāti kevalaṁ muṇḍitakesatāya muṇḍā pilotikakhaṇḍehi saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena “saṅghāṭī”ti laddhanāmena cīvarena pārutasarīrā.
atk-s0508a212:1224_6: “pesalo dhutavādo bahussuto”ti vā madhuravacanamanuyuttā “ariyo”ti ca kevalaṁ sambhāvanaṁ bahumānaṁyeva icchanti esanti,
atk-s0508a212:1225_0: Evanti “kusalānañca dhammānaṁ paññāya ca parikkhayā”ti vuttanayena.
atk-s0508a212:1225_2: nānappakārena vā saṁkilesadhamme payātuṁ pavattituṁ āraddhe.
atk-s0508a212:1225_3: Na dāni sukaraṁ tathāti idāni imasmiṁ dullabhakalyāṇamitte dullabhasappāyasaddhammassavane ca kāle yathā satthari dharante aphusitaṁ aphuṭṭhaṁ,
atk-s0508a212:1225_5: phusitaṁ vā hānabhāgiyaṁ ṭhitibhāgiyameva vā ahutvā yathā visesabhāgiyaṁ hoti,
atk-s0508a212:1226_0: Idāni attano parinibbānakālassa āsannattā saṁkhittena ovādena sabrahmacāriṁ ovadanto “yathā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānamhī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a212:1226_2: yathā puriso kenacideva payojanena kaṇṭakanicite padese anupāhano vicaranto “mā maṁ kaṇṭako vijjhī”ti satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvāva vicarati,
atk-s0508a212:1226_3: evaṁ kilesakaṇṭakanicite gocaragāme payojanena caranto muni satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvāna satisampajaññayutto
atk-s0508a212:1226_4: appamattova careyya kammaṭṭhānaṁ avijahantoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0508a212:1227_1: tesaṁ vattamanussaranti purimake yoge bhāvanāya yuttatāya yogī āraddhavipassake saritvā tesaṁ vattaṁ
atk-s0508a212:1227_2: āgamānusārena sammāpaṭipattibhāvanāvidhiṁ anussaranto dhuranikkhepaṁ akatvā yathāpaṭipajjanto.
atk-s0508a212:1227_3: Kiñcāpi pacchimo kāloti yadipāyaṁ atītasatthuko carimo kālo,
atk-s0508a212:1227_4: tathāpi yathādhammameva paṭipajjanto vipassanaṁ ussukkāpento phuseyya amataṁ padaṁ nibbānaṁ adhigaccheyya.
atk-s0508a212:1228_2: Ayañca osānagāthā saṅgītikārehi therassa parinibbānaṁ pakāsetuṁ vuttāti veditabbā.
